title: Bad
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Your butt is mine
I'm gonna tell you right
Just show your face
In broad daylight
I'm telling you on how I feel
Gonna hurt your mind
Don't shot to kill
I'm giving you on the count of three
To show your stuff or let it be
'Cause I'm telling you just watch your mouth
I know your game
What you're about
[Pre-Chorus]
But they say the sky's the limit
And to me that's really true
Cut my friend you've seen nothing
So just wait til I get through
[Chorus]
Because I'm bad
I'm bad
Come on
You know I'm bad
I'm bad
You know it
You know I'm bad
I'm bad
I'm really really bad
And the whole world has got to answer right now
Just to tell you once again who's bad

[Vrese 2]
The word is out
You're doing wrong
They're gonna lock you up before too long
Your lying eyes
Gonna tell you right
So listen up
Don't make a fight
Your talk is cheap
You're not a man
You're throwing stones to hide your hands
[Pre-Chorus]
But they say the sky's the limit
And to me that's really true
Cut my friend you've seen nothing
So just wait til I get through
[Chorus]
Because I'm bad
I'm bad
Come on
You know I'm bad
I'm bad
You know it
You know I'm bad
I'm bad
I'm really really bad
And the whole world has got to answer right now
Just to tell you once again who's bad
